portfolio.title: WanderLust
portfolio.description: Designed and developed an online marketplace website that connects people who want to rent out their property with people who are looking for accommodations, typically for short stays.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: Design a Weather App utilizes the Open Weather API for real-time weather updates. Users access detailed forecasts for their location or any global city.

portfolio.title: Todo List
portfolio.description: A simple and beautiful To-Do application built with ReactJS, Redux, and Vite. This application allows users to add, view, edit, delete, and mark tasks as done. The state is managed using Redux.

portfolio.title: Recipe WebApp
portfolio.description: A simple web app to explore, search. Find dishes by ingredients.

testimonial.description: Soumya’s dedication and technical proficiency were evident from the start. His clear communication and ability to deliver high-quality work under tight deadlines were outstanding. He’s a reliable and skilled developer who truly excels in his field.

Soumya's consistently delivered high-quality work and demonstrated exceptional technical skills throughout our collaboration. His proactive approach and attention to detail greatly contributed to the project’s success. A true professional who is a pleasure to work with.

Soumya’s commitment and technical knowledge were crucial in achieving our project goals. His innovative solutions and willingness to go the extra mile made a noticeable impact. I highly value his work ethic and problem-solving abilities.

items.title: WeatherApp
items.desc: Design a Weather App utilizes the Open Weather API for real-time weather updates. Users access detailed forecasts for their location or any global city.

items.title: WanderLust
items.desc: Designed and developed an online marketplace website that connects people who want to rent out their property with people who are looking for accommodations, typically for short stays.

items.title: TodoList
items.desc: A simple and beautiful To-Do application built with ReactJS, Redux, and Vite. This application allows users to add, view, edit, delete, and mark tasks as done. The state is managed using Redux.

items.title: Recipe Website
items.desc: Discover the delightful and mouthwatering food recipes that will tantalize your taste buds and impress your guests.
